titleStmt.title: A messenger of truth from the Common Hall, assembled in London on Midsummer-day last on account of the pretended petition. With allowance.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Whitlock, next door to the Dog-Tavern in Ludgate-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library.

person.persName: John Whitlock, next door to the Dog-Tavern
